nodes.text: The Orma was one of the four akias of Aramandi society. They were based on the planet Aram, and were the first akia to colonize another star system, the Orma system.

The Orma were the most devout followers of the Eeronon. They were the most peaceful akia, preferring to settle disputes through mediation or by religious observance. As a result of their religious devotion, the akia were the least tolerant of off-worlders. They dressed in plain brown clothes with a single amulet worn around the neck.
